__e: Just out of curiosity, what'd you do before the war, Sergeant?
Just out of curiosity, what happens when someone says, "I can't do this"?
Wait, so just out of curiosity... what happened to your last partner?
Too much curiosity and not enough common sense.
What did curiosity do to the cat?
What were they? Curiosity. And... maybe because I just knew I shouldn't.
Excellent. Perhaps we can mould this curiosity into an interest. Something you can share with others.
I came to this meeting out of curiosity.
Just out of curiosity, how exactly does this look?
I'm curious. How is it that you ended up working with him, anyway?
Just out of curiosity, how did you come up with the idea anyway?
Your fear is huge, but your curiosity is huger.
Just out of curiosity, something happen that I should know about?
- Curiosity killed a cat, and it certainly would have you if you'd opened it.
